column5: Perfectly Located Condo! Tree-lined Walkable Area. Experience Dallas like a local. Walk to our favorite restaurants & boutique shops. Direct access to downtown. Sleep 4, Stocked Kitchen and Bathroom. ASK ABOUT THE PARK PASS INCLUDED. Don't have the dates you need? Check out: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/13659593
column8: Urban Class + Desirable Area, Near Downtown
